column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Douglas - Thank you very much for your review. As you might imagine
column2: we have received our fair share of complaints regarding the servers' unified "Irrashai!" as each party is seated. Please allow me to explain: This is an integral part of our corporate culture here at JINYA. As a Japanese company that came to the U.S. more than 10 years ago
column3: JINYA brought many service customs that you will find in Japan today
column6: staff are trained to yell greetings ("Irrashai") to show their enthusiasm and genki spirit. Genki (元気) is a common Japanese word that means "energetic
